name: 3dMultiThresh
author: AFNI Team
description: Program to apply a multi-threshold (mthresh) dataset to an input dataset.

inputs.description: Multi-threshold dataset from 3dXClustSim, usually via running '3dttest++ -ETAC'.
inputs.name: Multi-threshold File

inputs.description: Indicates if the .mthresh.nii file from 3dXClustSim was created using 1-sided thresholding. Choose sign + or -.
inputs.name: Signed Flag

inputs.description: Prefix for output dataset. Can be 'NULL' to get no output dataset.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Instead of outputting a thresholded version of the input dataset, just output a 0/1 mask dataset of voxels that survive the process.
inputs.name: Mask Only Flag

inputs.description: Write out a multi-volume dataset with prefix 'qqq' where each volume is the binary mask of voxels that pass ONE of the tests.
inputs.name: All Mask Prefix

inputs.description: Prevents the output of a dataset if it would be all zero.
inputs.name: No Zero Flag

output-files.description: Thresholded version of the input dataset.
output-files.name: Output File

output-files.description: 0/1 mask dataset of voxels that survive the process.
output-files.name: Mask Output File

output-files.description: Multi-volume dataset where each volume is the binary mask of voxels that pass ONE of the tests.
output-files.name: All Mask Output File
